name: Urban Edge Properties
description: Urban Edge Properties is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the ownership, operation, and development of retail and mixed-use properties. The company was formed in 2014 and is headquartered in New York City, USA. Urban Edge primarily targets retail properties located in urban and suburban areas, emphasizing accessible locations with strong demographics and consumer bases. The company's portfolio includes shopping centers, retail properties, and mixed-use developments that cater to a variety of tenants, including national and regional retailers. Urban Edge aims to enhance the customer experience through innovative property management and redevelopment strategies, creating vibrant community hubs that meet the evolving needs of consumers. With a commitment to sustainability, Urban Edge also focuses on energy-efficient practices and environmentally responsible development. The company continues to adapt to changing market trends and consumer behaviors, ensuring that its properties remain competitive and relevant in the retail landscape. Urban Edge Properties is dedicated to delivering value to its shareholders while contributing positively to the communities it serves.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Urban Edge Properties | Retail & Mixed-Use Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Urban Edge Properties, a leading REIT focused on retail and mixed-use properties in urban and suburban markets. Discover our portfolio and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Urban Edge Properties do?
faq.answer: Urban Edge Properties is a real estate investment trust focused on the ownership and management of retail and mixed-use properties.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Urban Edge Properties?
faq.answer: Jeffrey D. Hecktman is the CEO of Urban Edge Properties.

faq.question: Where is Urban Edge Properties headquartered?
faq.answer: Urban Edge Properties is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Urban Edge own?
faq.answer: Urban Edge owns retail properties, shopping centers, and mixed-use developments.

faq.question: When was Urban Edge Properties founded?
faq.answer: Urban Edge Properties was founded in 2014.
